mapper.select: SELECT A.EMPL_ID, A.EMPL_PASSWORD, A.EMPL_NM, A.EMPL_TELNO, A.EMPL_EMAIL, A.EMPL_ZIP, A.EMPL_ADRES, A.EMPL_DETAIL_ADRES, A.EMPL_ENCPN, A.EMPL_BRTHDY, A.ENABLED, A.COMMON_CODE_DEPT, A.COMMON_CODE_CLSF, A.COMMON_CODE_HFFC_STTUS, A.COMMON_CODE_LAST_ACDMCR, B.AUTH_CODE, B.AUTH_EMP_ID FROM EMPL A, AUTH B WHERE A.EMPL_ID = B.AUTH_EMP_ID AND A.EMPL_ID = #{emplId}
mapper.insert:
{call declare begin INSERT INTO EMPL (EMPL_ID, EMPL_PASSWORD, EMPL_NM, EMPL_TELNO, EMPL_EMAIL, EMPL_ZIP, EMPL_ADRES, EMPL_DETAIL_ADRES, EMPL_ENCPN, EMPL_BRTHDY, ENABLED, COMMON_CODE_DEPT, COMMON_CODE_CLSF, COMMON_CODE_HFFC_STTUS, COMMON_CODE_LAST_ACDMCR) VALUES (#{emplId}, #{emplPassword}, #{emplNm}, #{emplTelno}, #{emplEmail}, #{emplZip}, #{emplAdres}, #{emplDetailAdres}, #{emplEncpn}, #{emplBrthdy}, #{enabled}, #{commonCodeDept}, #{commonCodeClsf}, #{commonCodeHffcSttus}, #{commonCodeLastAcdmcr});
INSERT INTO AUTH(AUTH_CODE, AUTH_EMP_ID) VALUES ('ROLE_NEW', #{emplId}); end}
